ygData.subject: Spell list posted on site, Thanks Malkin!
ygData.msgSnippet: ...  ... Thanks a bunch Malkin. I did a simple HTML conversion on the workbook and I m posting it to my site at
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 27 May 1999 10:18:04 -0400, you wrote:

>Due to the overwhelming response, I've sent the file to the group. If
<snip>
>ratio. I'll finish that after all the changes are compiled.
>
>Enjoy
>
>Malkin

Thanks a bunch Malkin. I did a simple HTML conversion on the workbook
and I'm posting it to my site at
http://bakersfield.kern.com/diableri/EQ/Magic/Wizzard/Wizzard%20Spell%20List.htm
with credits to you.

So people without a spreadsheet can get at it.

Malkin, if you're ticked about the posting, I'll take it down, just
let me know.

If there are any updates to the chart, I'll do my best to keep them
up.

Thanks again for your hard work.
Dayne D'Gorith, Teir'dal Faern of house D'Gorith
and Guild Har'oloth on the Karana Server
www.drow.net
